rows.label: qev079291_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah, it's you! What perfect timing! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0002
rows.name:
Metaphorically, I would equate the perfectness of your
timing with happening across an umbrella at just the
moment it begins to rain. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0003
rows.name:
Though I would not actually need an umbrella due to
my mask, but... Well, it's still a fairly good metaphor,
is it not? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0004
rows.name: *fsssssssssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ah, but no, *fsssh* I mustn't allow my satisfaction with
my well-crafted metaphor to distract me from the matter
at hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0006
rows.name:
And that matter is a most interesting Prone who is said
to speak in riddles known as "prophecies." *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0007
rows.name:
Contradictory though it sounds, he says these messages
from the past can be used to see the future. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0008
rows.name: Do you have any knowledge of this man? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0009
rows.name:
I would very much like to ask him why he chooses to
speak in such a fashion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_JNK0010
rows.name: Assist[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_SEL0011
rows.name: Explain that Nimu Turton is the man he seeks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_SEL0021
rows.name: Remain silent to avoid any potential trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0010
rows.name:
So this man dispenses his "prophecies" day and night
in the guise of a storyteller? *fsssh* A most amusing
and fascinating calling indeed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0011
rows.name: I would very much like to meet this Nimu. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0012
rows.name:
Or to put it in terms of the "prophecies" in which he
trades, perhaps I was destined to encounter him. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0013
rows.name:
Then our encounter would be fulfilling a "prophecy"
crafted thousands of years ago! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0014
rows.name:
What a strange feeling this is. I quite like it. *fsssh*
Hopefully Nimu will accept me as his apprentice and
teach me the ancient arts of prophecy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0015
rows.name: Oh? You haven't heard of him? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0016
rows.name:
Then this is more trouble than I had hoped. *fsssh*
My dreams of "prophecy" will die here and now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0017
rows.name:
Clearly the metaphors taught to me by Homer remain
my lone calling. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0018
rows.name:
To craft a metaphor, it is analogous to how we
Zaruboggan can devoltanize only voltant. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0019
rows.name:
So too shall I, Phoskeran, craft only metaphors! *fsssh*
...Yes. Well said.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev079291_MSG0020
rows.name:
I shall continue my quest to master figurative speech.
I hope to make steady progress with each passing day,
and also hope I continue to enjoy your support. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]
